# QR Code Generator with Flet

A simple and functional QR Code generator built in Python, using the **Flet** library for the graphical interface and the **qrcode** library for the image generation logic.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> This project was built for the **web version**. App-specific functionalities are still being implemented.

## Features
* Instant QR Code generation from URLs.
* Direct preview of the generated QR Code within the app.
* Download button for the generated file.
* Image update system (Cache Busting).

## Technologies Used

| Technology | Description |
| :--- | :--- |
| [Python](https://www.python.org/) | Programming language used for logic. |
| [Flet](https://flet.dev/) | UI Framework based on Flutter. |
| [qrcode](https://pypi.org/project/qrcode/) | Library for generating QR Codes. |
| [Pillow](https://python-pillow.org/) | Library for image processing. |

---

## Work in Progress
This project is currently under development. Future updates will include:
* Full compatibility for Desktop and Mobile applications.
* Enhanced file handling for local downloads.
* Customization options for QR Code colors and sizes.
